TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The game becomes bad and you are blamed for its unfortunate decline, you eventually get chased away from your home town by a lynch mob.

I wish people were not politicians.

Granted, but the world unity falls apart and north korea kills everybody...

I wish for NASA to get more funding and have altair, ares and constellation to be re-booted

Granted, but they a rocket crashes on you.

I wish that gmod actually worked...

Granted. You can't figure out how to install mods.

I wish for a pumpkin

Granted, your head becomes a pumpkin

I wish for .22 to come out

Granted but its so full of errors it just crashes...

I wish that i could install mods on gmod.

Granted but gmod crashes and you can't play more.

I wish an A.R.M (Atmospheric Reentry Module)

granted.

But the dev annouce that reentry heat and damage will never be added in the game.

I wish that this wish is not corrupted in any way.

Granted, but I will do it(actually, I AM doing it).

I wish I could travel back to 60's and see Vostok ascending live from Baikonur.
Granted, nothing bad ever happens while your there(I would want to do the sameI wish for a AJ 260 SRB IRL.

Error 404: Wish not found.

Grante, but it ignites 10 feet from you, with the exaust pointed at your head.

I wish the sayings "Yolo" and "SWAG" would vanish.

permanantly.

Granted, but they are replaced with equally annoying sayings.

I wish I could watch a supernova up close.

Granted, you are dead in 0.1 seconds...

I wish that space travel was commercial already... (by commercial, i mean like, as cheap as going on a jumbo jet )

Granted. Spacehijackers.

I wish I could do my pirate voice without destroying my throat.

Granted. Spacehijackers.

I wish I could do my pirate voice without destroying my throat.

GRANTED - However the sound coming from another orifice is not very pirate like!

I wish the USS Enterprise was a model available from Mazda!

Granted, but it explodes.

I wish for school to be over

Granted, it is over indefinitely and nobody shall ever be smart again!

I wish for a smiley face.

Granted. someone turned it upside down durning shipping.

I wish Postal services were competent.

Granted. But then every day your mailbox overflows from all the junkmail that hadn't been getting delivered suddenly coming through.

I wish my laptop wasn't randomly shutting off.

Granted. you stop running cookie clicker,

(yup Cy told me)

I wish for people to stop being addicted so easily

(...Dart...how long were you typing that to miss it by two posts?)

Edited September 17, 2013 by Rage097

Granted, they are so competent that they kill you.

I wish Jeb crashes a rocket in my face.

Granted. Jeb dies ;( That's because of you,I hope your happy!

I wish I could post something smart,you know:not like this wish!

Grnted, everybody hates you for posting something smart...

I wish for a proper signature

Granted, but you never have a proper POST again!

I wish I had 450 dollars.

Granted,but you have to pay the taxes and everything.

Now,you only have 50$ left.

EDIT:I wish I hadn't forgotten to make a wish before posting.

Edited September 17, 2013 by goldenpeach
Made a wish
